original_text: And he commanded a centurion to keep Paul, and to let him have liberty, and that he should forbid none of his acquaintance to minister or come unto him.
korean_text: 백부장에게 명하여 바울을 지키되 자유를 주고 그의 친구들이 그를 돌보아 주는 것을 금하지 말라 하니라

sentences.original_text: and to let him have liberty
and that he should forbid none of his acquaintance
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 지인 중 아무도 금하지 말라고

sentences.original_text: to minister or come unto him.
